wikipedia_page.main: Owen Edward McGee (born 29 April 1970) is an English former footballer. He joined Middlesbrough through a football apprenticeship, before eventually securing his place on the first team roster. He became a firm favourite to fans, scoring a single goal in 21 appearances. Despite his lack of goals, he was praised for scoring his first goal, as he played at full-back. He left Middlesbrough in 1992 due to disagreements with the team manager, and played for lower-level clubs Scarborough and Guisborough Town.
